description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon, Pickled Onion & Beetroot Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Salmon, Pickled Onion & Beetroot Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g no added salt cannellini beans, rinsed, drained
0.5 cup sweet chilli flavoured cashews, coarsely chopped
0.33 cup feta & dill Greek yoghurt dressing

recipeInstructions.text: Combine onion and vinegar in a large bowl. Stand for 10 minutes. Season with pepper.
Add oil, salad mix, beetroot, beans and cashews to onion mixture. Toss to combine. Serve salad topped with salmon and drizzled with dressing.
